tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  activity VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_data(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE encryption_at_rest (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 data VARCHAR(255),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_in_transit (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 data VARCHAR(255),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_privacy (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50),
 email VARCHAR(100),
 password VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE data_breaches (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 description TEXT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
